Al1 1b (1/2,1/2,1/2),

<br><INPUT TYPE="checkbox" NAME="zeromodes" VALUE="true"> Zero all mode and strain amplitudes for all output from this page
<p>Parameters:
<a href="isodistorthelp.php#modeparams" target="_blank"><img src=help.jpg></a><br>
"Interactive viewer":<br>
Atomic radius:
<input type="text" name="atomicradius" value="0.400" class="span1" size=5> Angstroms<br>
Bond length: minimum
<input type="text" name="bondlengthmin" value="0.000" class="span1" size=5>
maximum
<input type="text" name="bondlength" value="2.500" class="span1" size=5> Angstroms<br>
Window width:
<input type="text" name="appletwidth" value="1024" class="span1" size=5> pixels<br>
Viewing range:
xmin
<input type="text" class="span1" name="supercellxmin" value="0.000" size=5>
xmax
<input type="text" class="span1" name="supercellxmax" value="1.000" size=5>
ymin
<input type="text" class="span1" name="supercellymin" value="0.000" size=5>
ymax
<input type="text" class="span1" name="supercellymax" value="1.000" size=5>
zmin
<input type="text" class="span1" name="supercellzmin" value="0.000" size=5>
zmax
<input type="text" class="span1" name="supercellzmax" value="1.000" size=5><br>
Maximum displacement per mode:
<input type="text" class="span1" name="modeamplitude" value="1.000" size=5> Angstroms<br>
Maximum strain per mode:
<input type="text" class="span1" name="strainamplitude" value="0.100" size=5><br>
<br><INPUT TYPE="checkbox" NAME="topasstrain" VALUE="true">
Include strain modes in TOPAS.STR<br>
<br><INPUT TYPE="checkbox" NAME="treetopas" VALUE="true">
Generate TOPAS.STR output for subgroup tree<br>
<br><INPUT TYPE="checkbox" NAME="treecif" VALUE="true">
Generate CIF output for subgroup tree<br>
<br>Number of decimal places in CIF file:
<SELECT NAME="cifdec" class="span1">
<OPTION VALUE=" 5"> 5</OPTION>
<OPTION VALUE=" 5"> 5</OPTION>
<OPTION VALUE=" 6"> 6</OPTION>
<OPTION VALUE=" 7"> 7</OPTION>
<OPTION VALUE=" 8"> 8</OPTION>
<OPTION VALUE=" 9"> 9</OPTION>
<OPTION VALUE="10">10</OPTION>
<OPTION VALUE="11">11</OPTION>
<OPTION VALUE="12">12</OPTION>
<OPTION VALUE="13">13</OPTION>
<OPTION VALUE="14">14</OPTION>
<OPTION VALUE="15">15</OPTION>
<OPTION VALUE="16">16</OPTION>
</SELECT><br>
<br><INPUT TYPE="checkbox" NAME="nonstandardsetting" VALUE="true"> Use alternate (possibly nonstandard) setting in CIF output (matrix S<sup>-1t</sup>)<br>
Relative to 
<INPUT TYPE="radio" NAME="settingwrt" VALUE="parent" CHECKED> parent
<INPUT TYPE="radio" NAME="settingwrt" VALUE="subgroup"> subgroup<br>
Basis vectors of subgroup lattice (rational numbers):<br><table>
<tr><td>a' = </td><td><INPUT TYPE="text" NAME="basist11" class="span1" SIZE=3 VALUE="2 ">a +</td><td><INPUT TYPE="text" NAME="basist12" class="span1" SIZE=3 VALUE="0">b +</td><td><INPUT TYPE="text" NAME="basist13" class="span1" SIZE=3 VALUE="0">c</td><td width="40%"></td></tr>
<tr><td>b' = </td><td><INPUT TYPE="text" NAME="basist21" class="span1" SIZE=3 VALUE="0">a +</td><td><INPUT TYPE="text" NAME="basist22" class="span1" SIZE=3 VALUE="2 ">b +</td><td><INPUT TYPE="text" NAME="basist23" class="span1" SIZE=3 VALUE="0">c</td></tr>
<tr><td>c' = </td><td><INPUT TYPE="text" NAME="basist31" class="span1" SIZE=3 VALUE="0">a +</td><td><INPUT TYPE="text" NAME="basist32" class="span1" SIZE=3 VALUE="0">b +</td><td><INPUT TYPE="text" NAME="basist33" class="span1" SIZE=3 VALUE="2 ">c</td></tr>
<tr><td colspan=7>Origin of subgroup (either rational or decimal numbers):</td></tr>
<tr><td>&#964;' = </td><td><INPUT TYPE="text" NAME="origint1" class="span1" SIZE=3 VALUE="0">a +</td><td><INPUT TYPE="text" NAME="origint2" class="span1" SIZE=3 VALUE="0">b +</td><td><INPUT TYPE="text" NAME="origint3" class="span1" SIZE=3 VALUE="0">c +</td></tr></table>
<p>
<br><INPUT TYPE="checkbox" NAME="cifmovie" VALUE="true"> Make CIF movie<br>
<INPUT TYPE="radio" NAME="cifmoviezip" VALUE="true" CHECKED> separate CIF file for each frame or
<INPUT TYPE="radio" NAME="cifmoviezip" VALUE="false"> one CIF file with multiple data blocks<br>
minimum master amplitude:
<input type="text" class="span1" name="ampmincifmovie" value="0" size=5><br>
maximum master amplitude:
<input type="text" class="span1" name="ampmaxcifmovie" value="1" size=5><br>
number of frames:
<input type="text" class="span1" name="nframescifmovie" value="10" size=5><br>
variation of the master amplitude:
<INPUT TYPE="radio" NAME="varcifmovie" VALUE="linear" CHECKED> linear
<INPUT TYPE="radio" NAME="varcifmovie" VALUE="sine"> sine-wave<br>
fractional number of complete periods:
<input type="text" class="span1" name="periodscifmovie" value="1" size=5><br>
</FORM><p>
